Bran Flax Muffins.directions:
1. Mix together dry indredients
2. Stir in carrots, apples, raisins, and nuts
3. Combine milk, eggs, and vanilla
4. Stir together wet and dry ingredients - make sure to not over mix
5. Fill muffin cups 3/4 full
6. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 min
Bran Flax Muffins.ingredients:
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
3/4 c. flaxseed meal
3/4 c. oat bran cereal
1 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. finely shredded carrots
2 shredded apples
1/2 c. raisins (optional)
1 c. chopped nuts
2 beaten eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. milk

Blueberry Scones with Lemon Glaze.directions:
1. Sift together dry ingredients
2. Cut butter into flour
3. Make a well in the center and pour in heavy cream
4. Mix until just incorporated. Gently fold in blueberries
5. Press on floured surface into rectangle and cut into triangles
6. Bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 min

For the glaze:
Microwave all ingredients and whisk until smooth.

Pour glaze over cooled scones.
Blueberry Scones with Lemon Glaze.ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
5 Tbsp. cold butter
1 c. heavy cream
1 c. blueberries

Glaze:
1/4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. powdered sugar
zest of 1 lemon
1 Tbsp. butter

Homemade Granola.directions:
Combine all dry ingredients. Combine all wet ingredients. Mix the two together!

Bake 7-10 min until golden and a little crispy.
Homemade Granola.ingredients:
1 c. rolled oats
1 Tbsp. light brown sugar
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. honey
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. vanilla

Add-ins:
coconut
flax seed
chia seeds
raisins
almonds

Egg Pie.directions:
Lay out puff pastry in pie tin.  Spread onions, tomatoes, and goat cheese over whole pie. Pour egg mixture over everything else.

Bake at 400 degrees for about 10-12 min. Then reduce heat to 325 and cook until done, about 1 hr total.
Egg Pie.ingredients:
1 puff pastry
1/4 c. chopped onion
Enough tomatoes to cover pie (without seeds and juice)
2 oz goat cheese
5 eggs with milk

Chocolate Chip Cookies.directions:
Sift all dry ingredients, set aside. Cream butter and sugars together. Add eggs, one at a time. Add vanilla. Slowly add in dry ingredients to wet. Fold in chocolate chips.  Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet.

Bake at 350 degrees for 8-10 min.
Chocolate Chip Cookies.ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla         
1 1/2 c. chocolate chips

Pizza Dough.directions: Mix all ingredients together. Knead for 8 min. Transfer to oiled bowl and let rise for an hour. Punch down, divide into two, and shape into pizzas. Top with your favorite toppings and cook at 450 degrees for 10-12 min.
Pizza Dough.ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. yeast
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. gluten
1 c. warm water
